title: Cold Bloodlust
skills_text: If your Leader Card is ≪Frieza's Army≫, the Battle Card played has its skill negated for the duration of the turn.

title: Frieza's Call
skills_text: Choose 1 ≪Frieza's Army≫ card of energy cost 2 or less from your deck, and play it in Rest Mode. Then, shuffle your deck.

title: Broly, Berserker Origins
skills_text:
Choose 1 card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area : Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 3 or less and KO it.
When this card is removed from a Battle Area by a skill or KO'd, and if your Leader Card is a green 《Frieza's Army》 card, you may choose 2 cards from your hand and place them in your Drop Area. If you do, choose up to 1 green 〈Broly : Br〉 card with an energy cost of 6 from your hand and play it.

title: Broly, Unrealized Ambition
skills_text:
When you play this card from your hand and if your Leader Card is a green 《Frieza's Army》 card, choose 2 cards from your life and add them to your hand.
When this card is removed from a Battle Area by a skill or KO'd, and if your Leader Card is a green 《Frieza's Army》 card, choose 1 or 2 cards from your life and add them to your hand, then choose up to 1 green 〈Broly : Br〉 card with an energy cost of 4 from your hand and play it.

title: Paragus, Deadly Premonition
skills_text:
When you play this card from your hand, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck and choose up to 1 〈Broly : Br〉 card among them and add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
When this card is removed from your Battle Area by a skill and if your Leader Card is a green 《Frieza's Army》 card, choose up to 1 of your green energy and switch it to Active Mode.

title: Ties that Bind Ba
skills_text: Place this card in its owner's Drop Area : Choose up to 1 〈Broly : Br〉 card with an energy cost of 1 in your Drop Area and play it.

title: Broly Control Mechanism
skills_text:
(Place and activate this card in your Battle Area. It remains in your Battle Area until you activate another . When you do, place this card in its owner's Drop Area.)
Place this card in its owner's Drop Area : Choose 1 〈Broly : Br〉 card in your Battle Area, place it in its owner's Drop Area, and draw 1 card.

title: Wrathful Charge
skills_text: If your Leader Card is green : Negate the attack, then you may choose 1 of your Battle Cards and place it in your Drop Area. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 card from their hand and places it in their Drop Area.

title: Broly
skills_text:
Choose up to 1 green 《Frieza's Army》 card with an energy cost of 1 from your deck and add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck and negate this skill for the duration of the game.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 1 card, then choose up to 1 of your energy, switch it to Active Mode, and flip this card over.
skills_back_text:
If there are 2 or more Battle Cards in play in your Battle Area, you can't play Battle Cards.
(This skill takes effect when you have 7 or more cards in your Drop Area.) When this card attacks, draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.
Choose 1 of your Battle Cards and 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards : KO the chosen cards.

title: Broly, the Ravager
skills_text:
(When this card inflicts damage to your opponent's life, they place that many cards in their Drop Area instead of their hand.)
(You must place the top 3 cards of your deck in your Drop Area to activate this skill.) Your opponent chooses 1 card from their hand and places it in their Drop Area.

title: Broly, Rushing Forth
skills_text:
(When this card inflicts damage to your opponent's life, they place that many cards in their Drop Area instead of their hand.)
When this card is removed from a Battle Area by a skill or KO'd, you may choose 2 cards from your hand and place them in your Drop Area. If you do, choose up to 1 green 〈Broly : Br〉 card with an energy cost of 7 from your hand and play it.

title: Defending Father Paragus
skills_text:
(You can only include up to 4 cards with in your deck.)
When you combo with this card, if your Leader Card is green and your life is at 4 or less, draw 2 cards, then choose 1 card from your hand and send it to your Warp.

title: Cheelai, Frieza Force Soldier
skills_text:
When you play this card, draw 1 card.
: Choose up to 1 green 《Frieza's Army》 card with an energy cost of 2 or less from your deck and play it, then shuffle your deck.

title: Lemo, Frieza Force Soldier
skills_text: , choose 1 card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area : Choose up to 1 〈Cheelai : Br〉 card with an energy cost of 2 or less from your deck and play it, then shuffle your deck.

title: Son Goku, Time to Fight
skills_text:
If your opponent has 4 or more cards in Rest Mode, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 3.
When you play this card, you can't play {Son Goku, Time to Fight} for the duration of the turn.
Place this card in its owner's Drop Area : Choose 1 green or yellow 《Saiyan》 card with an energy cost of 3 or less and 10000 power or less from your Drop Area and play it in Rest Mode, and you can only play Battle Cards that are green or yellow and no other color for the duration of the turn.

title: Vegeta, Time to Fight
skills_text:
(When one of your other cards is attacked, you may switch this card to Rest Mode and change the target of the attack to this card.)
If your opponent has 4 or more cards in Rest Mode, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 3.

title: Godly Destruction Whis
skills_text:
When you play this card, draw 1 card.
When your opponent switches their energy to Active Mode using a non- skill during their turn, choose up to 1 of your opponent's energy and place it in its owner's Drop Area.

title: Godly Destruction Beerus
skills_text: When you play this card, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards in Rest Mode with an energy cost of 2 or less and KO it.
